div.p: You must be logged in to post a comment.

div.span: Horizon Science Academy Columbus Middle Charter School is managed by Concept Schools. Concept Schools is a nonprofit charter management organization that provides a high-quality, STEM-focused and college-preparatory education through a network of charter schools while offering exceptional programs, comprehensive services, and opportunities to partner in education.
